koohiiStory1: Mr. T says, "I ain´t afraid o´ no foo! I´ll give anyone an elbow to the face, I don´t care if it´s Buddha himself!".
koohiiStory2: Buddha is a person who always seems to have his elbows bent.
myStory: chữ phật. người chắp tay. người ăn chay.
